standard.description: Standards for correctly implementing Redwood patterns

test.test_name: Do not manipulates classes, text and attributes in Redwood
test.query_clob:
select case when lower(aapda.attribute_01) like '%.removeclass%'
            then 'N'
            when lower(aapda.attribute_01) like '%.addclass%'
            then 'N'
            when lower(aapda.attribute_01) like '%.text%'
            then 'N'
            when lower(aapda.attribute_01) like '%.prop%'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aapda.workspace,
       aapda.application_id, 
       aapda.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapda.last_updated_by,
       aapda.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Dynamic Action Action `%0` (app %1, page %2) manipulates the DOM: `%3...`', 
        p0 => aapda.dynamic_action_name, 
        p1 => aapda.application_id,
        p2 => aapda.page_id,
        p3 => substr(aapda.attribute_01,1,50)) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Dynamic Action Action `%0` manipulates the DOM (app %1, page %2, action id %3)', 
        p0 => aapda.dynamic_action_name, 
        p1 => aapda.application_id,
        p2 => aapda.page_id,
				p3 => aapda.action_id) issue_title,
       aapda.action_id component_id,
       aapda.dynamic_action_id parent_component_id,
       aapda.dynamic_action_name,
       aapda.attribute_01 javascript_code
from apex_application_page_da_acts aapda
inner join apex_applications aa on aapda.application_id = aa.application_id
                                and aa.theme_number = 1000
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapda.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapda.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapda.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapda.application_id
where aapda.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapda.action_code = 'NATIVE_JAVASCRIPT_CODE'
test.explanation: It should not be necessary to manipulate the dom for redwood components in redwood
